name: PersonalWorld
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: personal world
Developer Terms of Use
des:
add people to your circle and query their birthdays by date or name. Any day you can ask "Birthday for today" or "Birthday for January 10th" or even "Birthday of Maria", and the skill will give you the results. 
"Add Birthday" command will allow you to add new people to your world.
"Birthday for month" - will give you birthdays for the 30 days from today.
"Birthday for week" - will give you birthdays for the 7 days from today.
"Birthday for month of January" - will give you birthdays for January.
You can also delete birthdays by asking something like "Delete birthday of Maria" or "Delete birthday for January 10th".
